programme.title: The Tokyo G8 summit and unemployment
programme.short_synopsis: A recap of the 1992 G8 summit in Tokyo and the proposed solutions to unemployment.
programme.medium_synopsis: The activities of the 1992 G8 summit in Tokyo and the ways in which governments through history have dealt with the problem of unemployment.
